body:
Ah body writing, the biggest tame turn off in hentai. God, how I hate doujins where they write stupid shit like "used pussy" or "oji-san's cock", covering their body in ugly ass letters and making the woman in question look a hundred times more used. 

Sure, there are more disgusting turn off's but this at the top for me in the "tame" category. Not particularly gross, but incredibly offputting all the same. Like ruining a painting with scribbles, I guess.
@Kanabun, Abusing characters while asleep is kinda hot since their body reacts to sex uncounsciouly
Tf is the point if she's asleep? Half the fun is seeing their horny facial expressions as they get plowed
This pretty good, the art style does need more details, but still fappable. 8/10
